text: ninre saheadari natannupeavukayayirunnu. avalavite cenninnane parannu: “i kunnine nannayi pearran parrunna oralepparri nan ninnalkk parannu taratteyea?” annane ninne nam ninre matavinre atuttutanne tiriccetticcu. avalute kankulirkkan. aval duhkhikkatirikkanum. ni orale keannirunnuvallea. ennal atinre manahprayasattilninn ninne nam raksiccu. pala tarattilum ninne nam pariksiccu. pinnit keallannalealam ni madyankarute kute tamasiccu. anantaram allayea musa; ita ippeal daiva niscayamanusaricc ni ivite vannirikkunnu
